sentence.text: We have to think of a good plan.
The watermelon here is very sweet.
Chinese big cities; I have been to almost all of them.
translations: 中国的大城市，我几乎都去过

solutions: 中国的大城市我几乎都去过

sentence.text: I've only been to Beijing once.
I will first say a few sentences.
He didn't get off work until 11 in the evening.
His grades are always very good.
Please be quiet, the show is about to begin.
This problem is actually very easy.
Doing that is of course not allowed.
Recently he has often gone climbing.
Although the house is old, it is very clean.
translations: 房子虽然旧了，但是很干净

solutions: 房子虽然旧了但是很干净

sentence.text: She can speak Chinese, and can speak very well.
translations: 她会说汉语，而且说得很好

solutions: 她会说汉语而且说得很好

sentence.text: First eat, then watch a movie.
If everyone agrees, then we'll decide on this.
translations: 如果大家都同意，就这样决定了

solutions: 如果大家都同意就这样决定了

sentence.text: He is web surfing, and also listening to music.
translations: 他一边上网，一边听音乐

solutions: 他一边上网一边听音乐

sentence.text: Doing X, and also Y at the same time.
Give me a call or send an email, both will do.
translations: 给我打电话或者发电子邮件都可以

solutions: 给我打电话或者发电子邮件都可以

sentence.text: Are we getting a taxi or taking the subway?
translations: 我们是打车还是坐地铁？

solutions: 我们是打车还是坐地铁

sentence.text: To solve environmental problems, people think of a lot of solutions.
translations: 为了解决环境问题，人们想了很多办法

solutions: 为了解决环境问题人们想了很多办法

sentence.text: Besides painting, she also likes to dance.
translations: 除了画画儿，她还喜欢跳舞

solutions: 除了画画儿她还喜欢跳舞

sentence.text: Please switch on the air conditioning.
The fish was eaten by the cat.
About this piece of history, I know very little.
translations: 关于这段历史，我知道得很少

solutions: 关于这段历史我知道得很少

sentence.text: We should have a meeting at the weekend.
translations: 我们应该在周末开个会

sentence.text: Are you willing to marry me?
Do you dare to ride a horse?

Shanghai is not as cold as Beijing.

sentence.text: I 『agree』 with what you said. 『(lit. same opinion)』
